title: Android TV OS now has over 10,000 apps
content:
As Google has put more of its weight behind streaming in the living room, Android TV OS has seen considerable growth. This week as part of Google I/O 2022, Google has revealed that Android TV now has over 10,000 apps.

moreâ€¦

The post Android TV OS now has over 10,000 apps appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As of May 2022, Google says that Android TV OS now has over 10,000 apps available, up from 7,000 just two short years ago.
